name: MusicSubscription.Updates
desc: An asynchronous sequence to use for observing updates to the current state of the user’s subscription to Apple Music.

items.name: struct Iterator
items.desc: An iterator for the asynchronous sequence to use for observing updates to the current state of the user’s subscription to Apple Music.

items.name: func makeAsyncIterator() -> MusicSubscription.Updates.Iterator
items.desc: Creates the asynchronous iterator that produces elements of this asynchronous sequence.

items.name: typealias AsyncIterator
items.desc: The type of asynchronous iterator that produces elements of this asynchronous sequence.

items.name: typealias Element
items.desc: The type of element the asynchronous sequence produces.
